header.title: NEW ENERGY WAYS V2
header.category: Western Esotericism, Energy Work, Psychic Development, Self-Healing

central_thesis: The "NEW Energy Ways" (NEW) system is a highly effective, non-visual, tactile-based approach to energy body manipulation, development, and self-healing. By utilizing 'Mobile Body Awareness' (M.B.A.) and 'Tactile Imaging' (T.I.) to stimulate secondary and tertiary energy centers, and eventually primary centers, practitioners can significantly increase energy flow, clear blockages, boost the immune system, and enhance psychic abilities without requiring prior experience or traditional visualization.

structure_content.summary: Introduces the NEW system as a simple yet advanced method for energy development, suitable for all experience levels, and beneficial for spiritual, psychic, and physical well-being. It highlights Tactile Imaging (T.I.) as its core non-visual technique, focusing on secondary and tertiary energy centers, and distinguishes its Western terminology from potentially confusing Eastern terms.

Describes the human energy body as a complex structure of etheric matter, outlining five main energetic circuits: Master (Kundalini), Storage (Sub-Navel, Sub-Heart, Sub-Brow), Primary (Major Chakras), Secondary (Minor Chakras), and Tertiary (Energy Exchange Ports). It emphasizes developing supporting circuits (secondary and tertiary) first to ensure balanced energy flow and prevent depletion or adverse effects, especially when working with primary centers. It details the location and function of the three main energy storage centers, secondary centers, and energy exchange ports.

Challenges the conventional understanding and teaching of visualization in energy work, arguing that it is often poorly explained and creates unnecessary barriers for most practitioners. It asserts that true visualization is imagination, a natural ability everyone possesses, and introduces 'Tactile Imaging' (T.I.) as a non-visual, touch-based imaging system, which is presented as an easier and more effective alternative to traditional visualization techniques for energetic stimulation.

Explains Mobile Body Awareness (M.B.A.) as the fundamental skill of shifting and focusing one's point of awareness to any specific part of the physical body. It provides practical exercises for localizing body awareness, initially using light physical contact (scratching/rubbing) to create a 'tingling sensation' to 'highlight' areas, then progressing to focusing awareness alone. This skill is crucial for dynamic energy body manipulation and controlled energy flow.

Defines Tactile Imaging (T.I.) as the active application of M.B.A., where focused body awareness is given motion within a specific area to directly stimulate energy centers. It describes practical T.I. exercises like circular 'stirring,' 'brushing,' and 'wrapping' actions on areas like thumb joints and big toes. It also introduces 'Awareness Hands' as imaginary extensions for energy manipulation and 'Splitting Awareness' to work on multiple body parts simultaneously, noting that initial sensations (heaviness, tingling) indicate successful stimulation.

Outlines five core 'Awareness Actions' used in Tactile Imaging to stimulate the energy body: Stirring, Brushing, Wrapping, Tearing, and Sponging. It provides general instructional notes, emphasizing light relaxation, bare feet, loose clothing, and closed eyes (initially optional) for optimal practice. It includes cautions for managing non-responsive areas and potential overstimulation, underscoring that preliminary work on secondary and tertiary centers is foundational for clearing blockages and increasing energy flow.

Details specific T.I. exercises for stimulating energy exchange ports and secondary centers in the feet and legs. This includes targeted work on big toes (stirring, brushing, wrapping), lesser toes (brushing, sponging), all toes (wide brushing), soles (mobile rotary stirring, wide brushing), heels (deep stirring), whole foot (deep sponging), ankles (stirring, wrapping), and knees (stirring, brushing, wrapping). It also outlines procedures for brushing along the five main leg pathways (front, rear, inner, outer, bone marrow core) and stimulating hip centers, with specific cautions for the sensitive groin crease centers.

Presents specific T.I. exercises for stimulating energy centers and pathways in the hands and arms, mirroring the methodologies used for leg development. This includes detailed work on finger joints (stirring), entire fingers (narrow brushing, wrapping), back of hand (wide brushing), palms (rotary stirring, wide brushing, sponging), wrists (stirring, brushing, wrapping), elbows (stirring, brushing, wrapping), and shoulders (stirring, brushing). It also describes wide brushing along inner and outer arm pathways and sponging through the whole arm, concluding with a quick reference guide for these practices.

Introduces 'Energy Bounce' as an awareness technique designed to clear, redefine, and strengthen energy pathways by rapidly moving awareness through the energy body. This process leverages the 'Awareness Resistance Factor,' a natural sensation of dragging or slowing, which indicates contact with the energy body. Specific exercises include Leg Bounce, Arm Bounce, Spinal Bounce (noted for alleviating back tension and stimulating primary center roots), and Full Body Bounce, with guidance on finding the correct speed and rhythm.

Details methods for raising and storing energy, primarily into the Sub-Navel storage center. It covers 'Basic Procedures for Leg Energy Raising' (pre-stimulating feet, sponging up legs, directing to Sub-Navel) and 'Arm Energy Raising' (pre-stimulating hands, sponging up arms, directing to Sub-Navel). These are integrated into 'Two Part Storage Circuit' and the comprehensive 'Full Body Storage Circuit,' which combines awareness actions with natural breathing for continuous energy flow. It also discusses 'Direct Sub-Navel Energy Raising' and the appropriate 'Energy Flow & Effort' levels.

Explains that strong energy movement sensations, such as tingling, buzzing, and rushing water, are natural responses to increased energy flow through resistant pathways and decrease as the energy body develops. It lists common sensations and provides case histories from volunteers ('Mr. A', 'Mr. C', 'Ms. C', 'Mr. T', 'Mr. S') illustrating diverse experiences, including self-healing, increased energy levels, and psychic phenomena. A crucial warning is given against overstimulating the Sub-Heart and Sub-Brow storage centers due to potential adverse emotional and mental effects.

Discusses potential temporary physical side-effects such as swellings, rashes, or blisters, attributing them to overloaded nerve endings from increased energy flow, and notes their rapid healing with continued practice. It elaborates on 'Self-Healing Side-Effects,' highlighting the system's ability to aid recovery from physical injuries and illnesses (like colds/flu) by boosting the immune system, possibly through stimulating bone marrow. The concept of 'Continuing Energy Demands' explains why sensations may persist after exercises as depleted areas continue to draw energy.

Expands on advanced techniques and concepts, including 'Energy Centre Spin' (reversing awareness direction to find optimal flow), 'Awareness Momentum' (automatic continuation of repeated actions), and the 'Etheric Wrap Technique' for healing damaged areas. It advises utilizing 'High Energy Areas' (natural environments, crowds) and promoting 'Daily Energy Raising Time' for continuous practice. It also covers 'Mouth Centres & Exchange Ports' stimulation, 'Food Energy Awareness' (extracting life force from food), and 'Wind Energy' combined with 'Energy Breathing' (using colored air for vitality and healing).

Elaborates on the intricate connection between the energy body and physical health, likening the bio-energy system to a circulatory system that, when strengthened, dramatically boosts the immune system. It suggests that clearing energy blockages can prevent and heal disease, offering a 'preventative medicine' approach. Case studies are presented for diabetes (reducing insulin dosage) and cancer (stopping tumor growth, improving overall health), along with 'Recommended Daily Regimes' (Stages One to Four) for various levels of energetic development and healing, including 'Perpetual Energy Raising' and 'Energy Raising During Sleep'.

Concludes by reiterating the significant rewards of consistent NEW system practice, including improved physical health, vitality, bioenergy perception, and enhanced psychic abilities, emphasizing its rapid effectiveness. It encourages diligent application of the complete system, including primary center work, and directs readers to 'Astral Dynamics' for deeper core skills and metaphysical development.

Describes Robert Bruce's 'Astral Dynamics' as a comprehensive, innovative guide to Out-of-Body Experiences (OBE). It highlights key contributions such as the 'Mind-Split theory' and the integration of 'NEW Energy Ways' for energetic manipulation, positioning it as an essential work for OBE practitioners and metaphysical development.

Introduces Robert Bruce's 'Practical Psychic Self-Defense' (PPSD) as a manual for understanding and countering 'unseen influences' and 'negative inorganic beings' ('negs'). It offers practical, experience-based countermeasures and explains the mechanisms of psychic invasion and possession, serving as a survival guide for individuals facing supernatural problems, grounded in applied metaphysics.

key_concepts.definition: A simple yet advanced energy development system focusing on bioenergetic manipulation, development, and self-healing, primarily through non-visual tactile methods.
A complex, subtle energy reflection of the physical body, composed of structured etheric matter, containing interdependent energetic circuits that bind physical with nonphysical.

The active use of body awareness, based on the sense of touch and feel (non-visual), to directly stimulate and manipulate the energy body in a controlled, dynamic way through specific awareness actions.
The ability to move and focus one's point of awareness upon any specific part of the physical body, crucial for dynamic manipulation of the energy body and its centers.

The interdependent energetic structures within the energy body: Master (Kundalini), Storage (Sub-Navel, Sub-Heart, Sub-Brow), Primary (Seven Primary Centres/major Chakras), Secondary (Supporting Secondary Centres/minor Chakras), and Tertiary (Energy Exchange Ports).

Three main vitality storage centers where different qualities of energy are accumulated: Sub-Navel (raw physical vitality), Sub-Heart (raw emotional energy), and Sub-Brow (raw mental and psychic energy). The Sub-Navel is the primary and safest to fill, automatically overflowing into the others.

Smaller, simpler energy centers (minor Chakras) that refine and condition energies from the tertiary system, akin to bio-energetic electronic components. They are interconnected through energy pathways and can be skeletal or organ-attached.

Tiny, pore-like energy centers covering the skin, heavily concentrated in areas like the soles of feet, palms of hands, nasal passages, lips, mouth, tongue, and genitals. Their basic function is to absorb and discharge energies and detect energy.
Imaginary extensions of active body awareness used for raising energy, clearing blockages, and manipulating energy centers, developing in strength and dexterity with use.
The ability to focus body awareness and perform awareness actions on multiple body parts or limbs simultaneously.
Core Tactile Imaging techniques: Stirring (circular motion), Brushing (back and forth), Wrapping (spiraling around), Tearing (two-handed pulling apart), and Sponging (upwards drawing/filling action).
Rapid movements of awareness through the energy body (e.g., legs, arms, spine) designed to clear, redefine, and strengthen energy pathways by interacting with the 'Awareness Resistance Factor'.
The natural sensation of something slowing or dragging at the awareness action when moved rapidly through the energy body, allowing one to feel the substance of their own energy body.

A versatile Tactile Imaging technique involving imagining and feeling an 'endless white bandage of pure energy' wrapping around a damaged body area or internal organ to clear blockages and restore energetic health.

A technique that combines conscious awareness with natural breathing to absorb life energy (often imagined as colored air) through nasal passages and lungs, directing it into the Sub-Navel center, and expelling waste energy (dirty colored air) during the OUT breath.

Terms defined by the author: 'Bioenergy' describes energy related to both the physical and energy bodies. 'Bioenergetic' describes an energy function, process, aspect, or sensation related to both. 'Energetic' describes such elements relating more to the energy body than the physical body.

practical_system.description: The NEW Energy Ways V2 system is a non-visual, tactile-based energy manipulation and self-healing system. It leverages 'Mobile Body Awareness' (M.B.A.) to precisely focus attention and 'Tactile Imaging' (T.I.) using specific 'Awareness Actions' (Stirring, Brushing, Wrapping, Tearing, Sponging) to directly stimulate and develop the human energy body. The system emphasizes a progressive approach, starting with peripheral secondary and tertiary energy centers (e.g., in feet and hands) to build foundational energy flow and clear blockages, before advancing to primary centers and full-body circuits. Its core objective is to increase vital energy, store it primarily in the Sub-Navel center, and thereby enhance physical health, boost the immune system, and facilitate psychic development. The system is designed to be integrated into daily life and practiced without requiring deep trance states.
tools: Fingernails or ruler (for light scratching/highlighting during initial M.B.A. exercises)
Small stick or ruler (to reach certain body parts for highlighting)
Paintbrush (for tracing energy pathways on skin)
Pillow or cushion (for comfort during seated exercises)
Scented cloth, flower, potpourri, or oil burner (for scent stimulation in conjunction with nasal exercises)
Watch alarm (as a psychological trigger for 'Perpetual Energy Raising')
Anatomy book (for identifying precise locations of internal organs for targeted energy work)
rituals: Mobile Body Awareness (M.B.A.) exercises: Shifting point of awareness to body parts, highlighting with light scratching/rubbing (initially), then focusing awareness alone to feel shape and outline.
Body Awareness Sensitivity exercises: Tracing pathways on skin with fingertips/paintbrush, then following with awareness; repeated stroking along arm/leg pathways.

Tactile Imaging (T.I.) exercises: Applying Stirring (circular), Brushing (back and forth), and Wrapping (spiraling) actions on specific joints (e.g., thumb joints, big toes, ankles, knees, wrists, elbows, shoulders) and entire fingers/toes/hands/feet.
Limb Development: Using wide brushing action along specific pathways (front, rear, inner, outer leg/arm) and sponging action through the whole of limbs (legs, arms).
Splitting Awareness: Performing awareness actions simultaneously on two limbs or body areas.
Energy Bounce Techniques: Rapidly moving awareness through legs, arms, or the spine (from coccyx to head) to create energetic ripple-waves and clear pathways.

Two-Part Storage Circuit: Coordinating IN-breath with raising energy up legs to Sub-Navel, and OUT-breath with drawing energy from arms down chest to Sub-Navel, with awareness flicking between feet and hands.

Full Body Storage Circuit: A continuous energy flow integrated with natural breathing, raising energy from feet/hands up through legs/arms/spine to crown, then sweeping it down the face/chest into the Sub-Navel.
Direct Sub-Navel Energy Raising: Focusing on a vacuum-like feeling in the Sub-Navel and drawing energy directly into it from all limbs simultaneously, sometimes using a litany.
Etheric Wrap Technique: Imagining an endless white energy bandage wrapping around a specific damaged body area or internal organ to clear blockages and promote healing.
Nasal Stimulation: Stirring the tip of the nose, brushing inside nostrils, brushing the entire nose, and sponging the whole nose as pre-stimulation for energy breathing.
Food Energy Awareness: Consciously focusing awareness during eating/drinking to 'suck' life force from food/drink into the Sub-Navel.
Wind Energy Raising: Holding hands out, feeling the wind's energy, drawing it in through hands/arms with the IN breath to the Sub-Navel, and exhaling waste energy with the OUT breath.

Energy Breathing: Consciously following the leading edge of air entering (imagining bright, colored energy) and leaving (imagining dirty, waste energy) the body through nasal passages, throat, and lungs, directing it to the Sub-Navel.
Crowd & Excitement Energy: Centering awareness in the Sub-Navel and reaching out to absorb emotional energy from excited crowds.

relevant_quotes.text: NEW is the simplest yet most advanced energy development system in the world today. It is child's-play to learn and use and requires no prior experience or knowledge at all. Anyone can learn the NEW system and have speedy results.

The development exercises and techniques given in this book are NOT based on visualization. Instead, a concise non-visual imaging system called 'Tactile Imaging' is used. This is based on the active use of body awareness, using the sense of touch and feel. These techniques are very easy to learn and use. They are also far more effective than visualization-based techniques could ever be.

In order to effectively stimulate your energy body, it is necessary to be able to focus your point of awareness at a single point on your body, and then to move and manipulate that point of awareness. This is done with active body awareness, with something I have called Tactile Imaging.

Caution – Groin Crease Centres. The groin crease centres are the largest, most powerful and sensitive secondary energy centres in the entire body. I do not recommend experimenting with or playing around with these centres just to see what might happen.

Strong energy movement sensations are primarily caused by resistance within the energy body. This is natural resistance to an increased flow of energy through blocked or narrowed energy centres and bioenergy circuitry.

The NEW system stimulates and energizes the immune system in a subtle bio-energetic way. It is possible that deep bio-energy movement inside the legs affects the bone marrow and consequentially empowers antibody production therein. Note that bone marrow is strongly linked with blood production and can be said to be the seat of the immune system.

I am not saying everyone using the NEW system will have the same results as my mother. But it is reasonable to suggest, faced with the evidence I have before me, that the NEW system may be beneficial to good health in cases like this.

critical_analysis.relevance: Robert Bruce's 'NEW Energy Ways V2' is a highly relevant contribution to modern energy work and practical esotericism, offering a systematic and accessible method for bio-energetic development. Its central innovation, 'Tactile Imaging' (T.I.), directly addresses a significant barrier in many traditional systems that rely heavily on visual imagination, thereby expanding the applicability of energy work to a broader audience. The emphasis on developing secondary and tertiary energy centers first, before primary chakras, reflects a pragmatic and safety-conscious approach to energetic cultivation, aiming to prevent common issues like depletion or imbalance. The detailed, step-by-step exercises for stimulating various body parts and integrating energy raising with natural physiological processes (like breathing) make it a highly operative manual. The book's claims of self-healing, immune system boosting, and enhanced psychic abilities, supported by anecdotal case studies, resonate with the holistic goals often sought in occult and esoteric practices. Its explicit distinction from Eastern terminologies and focus on Western descriptive language makes it uniquely approachable, bridging potential cultural and conceptual gaps for Western practitioners.
critical_analysis.target_audience: The book targets a remarkably broad audience, from 'complete beginners' with no prior experience in energy work or metaphysics to 'intermediate and advanced students,' and practitioners of other bioenergetic systems like Tai Chi, Qi Gong, Yoga, Tantra, and Reiki. It is specifically designed for individuals seeking spiritual or psychic development, as well as those needing self-healing for physical injuries, chronic conditions (e.g., diabetes, arthritis), or illnesses (colds/flu). The non-visual 'Tactile Imaging' approach makes it uniquely suitable for individuals who struggle with traditional visualization. Its use of 'plain English' and Western descriptive terminology ensures accessibility for laypersons, while the detailed practical instructions cater to those desiring an operative manual for energetic practice.
